titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the work opportunity tax credit for Hurricane Katrina employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
8/2/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Katrina Emergency Tax Relief Act of 2005 to extend for an additional two-year period the eligibility of Hurricane Katrina employees for the work opportunity tax credit.
